Description: The Cutie Map serves as a magic display for 'friendship emergencies', or something. Starlight won't let you go near it after... the incident.

Descriptions.default: The Cutie Map serves as a magic display for 'friendship emergencies', or something. Starlight won't let you go near it after... the incident.

Description: The thrones of the Council of Friendship, or whatever Twilight's group call themselves. Each bear the cutie mark of its owner. Despite being made of crystal, they're surprisingly comfortable.

Descriptions.default: The thrones of the Council of Friendship, or whatever Twilight's group call themselves. Each bear the cutie mark of its owner. Despite being made of crystal, they're surprisingly comfortable.

Description: Twilight's throne. You sometimes sit here when she's not around. Or sometimes when she is.

Descriptions.default: Twilight's throne. You sometimes sit here when she's not around. Or sometimes when she is.

Description: Rarity's throne. She probably brings cushions.

Descriptions.default: Rarity's throne. She probably brings cushions.

Description: Applejack's throne. You can tell by the dried apple juice stains.

Descriptions.default: Applejack's throne. You can tell by the dried apple juice stains.

Description: Pinkie Pie's throne. What marechiavellian party plans have been planned from this seat, you wonder?

Descriptions.default: Pinkie Pie's throne. What marechiavellian party plans have been planned from this seat, you wonder?

Description: Fluttershy's throne. She sits on it like she's afraid it'll break.

Descriptions.default: Fluttershy's throne. She sits on it like she's afraid it'll break.

Description: Rainbow Dash's throne. It's just another napping spot to her.

Descriptions.default: Rainbow Dash's throne. It's just another napping spot to her.

Description: Spike's throne. A diminuitive seat for a diminuitive guy.

Descriptions.default: Spike's throne. A diminuitive seat for a diminuitive guy.
An apple tree, full of ripe fruit.

harvest: writeline:You pick a juicy red apple from the tree.

Description: A sewing machine for advanced stitchwork. You could use it to fix damaged clothes... or better yet, let Rarity do it for you. It's her job, not yours.

Descriptions.default: A sewing machine for advanced stitchwork. You could use it to fix damaged clothes... or better yet, let Rarity do it for you. It's her job, not yours.

Description: A typical oven for baking. You could probably use it... if you wanted to. Or you could get somepony else to do it for you.

Descriptions.default: A typical oven for baking. You could probably use it... if you wanted to. Or you could get somepony else to do it for you.
A beautiful full-length mirror, set in an oval frame and decorated with sciencey knickknacks. According to Starlight, it leads to strange alternate world.
Descriptions.inactive: Right now, it only shows your reflection.
Descriptions.active: The surface swirls with mesmerizing colors. You think you could step inside...

enter: writeline:Immediately, you are whisked away through a maddening sea of colors. You feel your body changing...

Descriptions.default: A large marble foundation for a statue, which appears to be smashed to pieces. You think you can see a faint glow coming from the top. You sense considerable magic in it.
Descriptions.inactive: The sides of the base appears to be completely solid.
Descriptions.active: While seemingly solid and rock-like, the statue offers no resistance to entry. You can pass through with ease.

enter: writeline:Immediately, you are whisked away through a maddening sea of colors. You feel your body changing...
